checking.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

md5.title: Md5
md5.description: The MD5 checksum of the file if available.

sha1.title: Sha1
sha1.description: The SHA-1 checksum of the file if available.

sha224.title: Sha224
sha224.description: The SHA-224 checksum of the file if available.

sha256.title: Sha256
sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum of the file if available.

sha384.title: Sha384
sha384.description: The SHA-384 checksum of the file if available.

sha512.title: Sha512
sha512.description: The SHA-512 checksum of the file if available.

_artifact.title: artifact
_artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Relative location of the file within the repository

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique distribution name. Ex, `rawhide` and `stable`.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Publications created by this publisher and repository are automaticallyserved as defined by this distribution

publication.title: Publication
publication.description: The publication being served as defined by this distribution

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: Publications created by this repository and publisher are automaticallyserved as defined by this distribution

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: Remote that can be used to fetch content when using pull-through caching.

base_path.title: Base path
base_path.description: The base (relative) path component of the published url. Avoid paths that                     overlap with other distribution base paths (e.g. "foo" and "foo/bar")

base_url.title: Base url
base_url.description: The URL for accessing the publication as defined by this distribution.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: The publisher that created this publication.

_distributions.description: This publication is currently being served asdefined by these distributions.

items.description: This publication is currently being served asdefined by these distributions.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this publisher.

_last_updated.title: last updated
_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the publisher configuration.

manifest.title: Manifest
manifest.description: Name of the file manifest, the full path will be url/manifest

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

repository_version.title: Repository Version
repository_version.description: A URI of the repository version to be published.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of an external content source.

validate.title: Validate
validate.description: If True, the plugin will validate imported artifacts.

ssl_ca_certificate.title: Ssl ca certificate
ssl_ca_certificate.description: A PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server.

ssl_client_certificate.title: Ssl client certificate
ssl_client_certificate.description: A PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication.

ssl_client_key.title: Ssl client key
ssl_client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication.

ssl_validation.title: Ssl validation
ssl_validation.description: If True, SSL peer validation must be performed.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to be used for authentication when syncing.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to be used for authentication when syncing.

_last_updated.title: last updated
_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the remote.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The policy to use when downloading content. The possible values include: 'immediate', 'on_demand', and 'cache_only'. 'immediate' is the default.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

mirror.title: Mirror
mirror.description: The synchronization mode, True for "mirror" and False for "additive" mode.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this repository.

base_version.title: Base version
base_version.description: A repository version whose content was used as the initial set of content for this repository version

content_summary.title: Content summary
content_summary.description: Various count summaries of the content in the version and the HREF to view them.

add_content_units.description: A list of content units to add to a new repository version

remove_content_units.description: A list of content units to remove from the latest repository version

base_version.title: Base version
base_version.description: A repository version whose content will be used as the initial set of content for the new repository version

message.title: Message
message.description: The message shown to the user for the progress report.

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the progress report. The possible values are: 'waiting', 'skipped', 'running', 'completed', 'failed' and 'canceled'. The default is 'waiting'.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total count of items to be handled by the ProgressBar.

done.title: Done
done.description: The count of items already processed. Defaults to 0.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The suffix to be shown with the progress report.

task.title: Task
task.description: The task associated with this progress report.

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the task. The possible values include: 'waiting', 'skipped', 'running', 'completed', 'failed' and 'canceled'.

started_at.title: Started at
started_at.description: Timestamp of the when this task started execution.

finished_at.title: Finished at
finished_at.description: Timestamp of the when this task stopped execution.

non_fatal_errors.title: Non fatal errors
non_fatal_errors.description: A JSON Object of non-fatal errors encountered during the execution of this task.

error.title: Error
error.description: A JSON Object of a fatal error encountered during the execution of this task.

worker.title: Worker
worker.description: The worker associated with this task. This field is empty if a worker is not yet assigned.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: The parent task that spawned this task.

spawned_tasks.description: Any tasks spawned by this task.

items.description: Any tasks spawned by this task.

last_heartbeat.title: Last heartbeat
last_heartbeat.description: Timestamp of the last time the worker talked to the service.

online.title: Online
online.description: True if the worker is considered online, otherwise False

missing.title: Missing
missing.description: True if the worker is considerd missing, otherwise False
